Perform simulation

perform_simulation.Rd

Perform simulation

Usage

perform_simulation(imp_numbers, trials, n_vec, alpha_vec)

Arguments

imp_numbers

List. List of implementations to test

trials

Integer. Number of Trials.

n_vec

List. n values to test

alpha_vec

List. alpha values to test

Value

A list with simulation results

Examples

# Run a simulation across multiple graph sizes and alpha thresholds
n_vec <- c(10)
alpha_vec <- c(0.5)

n_level_list <- perform_simulation(
  imp_numbers = 1:10,
  trials = 3,
  n_vec = n_vec,
  alpha_vec = alpha_vec
)
#> [1] "Value of n: 10"
#> [1] "  Value of alpha: 0.5"
#> [1] "    Working on trial: 1"
#> **********
#> [1] "    Working on trial: 2"
#> **********
#> [1] "    Working on trial: 3"
#> **********
#> [1] "  ===="

# Record metadata: date of run and session info
date_of_run <- Sys.time()
session_info <- devtools::session_info()

# Save the results to file for reproducibility
save(
  n_level_list, alpha_vec, n_vec,
  date_of_run, session_info,
  file = "~/HW4_simulation.RData"
)
